title: Cities and states are turning to AI to improve road safety
description: As America’s aging roads fall further behind on much-needed repairs, cities and states are turning to artificial intelligence.
content:
As America’s aging roads fall further behind on much-needed repairs, cities and states are turning to artificial intelligence to spot the worst hazards and decide which fixes should come first.

title: ChatGPT Is Just Too Dangerous for Teenagers
description: When Jacob Irwin asked ChatGPT about faster-than-light (FTL) travel, it didn’t challenge his theory as any expert physicist might. The artificial intelligence system, which has 800 million weekly users, called it one of the “most robust… systems ever proposed.” That misplaced flattery, according to a recent lawsuit, helped push the 30-year-old Wisconsin man into a psychotic episode. The suit is one of seven levelled against OpenAI last week alleging the company released dangerously manipulative

title: Samsung plans $310 billion investment to power AI expansion
description: South Korean conglomerate Samsung unveiled on Sunday a plan to invest $310 billion over the next five years mostly in technology powering artificial intelligence.
content:
South Korean conglomerate Samsung unveiled on Sunday a plan to invest $310 billion over the next five years mostly in technology powering artificial intelligence, aiming to meet growing demand driven by a global boom.

title: US Congressman Calls For AI Regulations After Call Of Duty: Black Ops 7 Debate
description: Activision's apparent use of AI in Black Ops 7 has led to a Congressman to urge action to get artificial intelligence under control.
content: Earlier this month, Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 players called out the apparent use of AI in the game, especially the "Ghibli-style" Calling Cards. Activision subsequently acknowledged that some AI was used in the creation of Black Ops 7, but it insist... [1731 chars]

title: Cheap AI tools fuel teen-driven rise in deepfake sex crimes in South Korea
description: SEOUL: A sharp rise in artificial intelligence-generated sex crimes in South Korea is being driven largely by teenagers, according to police, in what officials describe as a troubling intersection of cheap deepfake technology, digital manipulation and underage offenders.

title: AI Startup Turing Secures Denso’s Backing at $388 Million Value
description: Japanese self-driving tech startup Turing Inc. raised about ¥15.3 billion ($99 million) from investors including Toyota Motor Corp. supplier Denso Corp., underscoring growing interest in the company’s artificial intelligence technology.
content:

title: Stocks cautious as Nvidia earnings test looms
description: Asia's stock markets struck a cautious tone on Monday as traders looked ahead to a week of corporate earnings and catch-up U.S. data, with the focus on the interest rate outlook and the fate of a frothy rally in artificial intelligence stocks.

title: Anthropic CEO warns that without guardrails, AI could be on dangerous path
description: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei centered his artificial intelligence brand around safety and transparency. He's determined to figure out the ways AI can be misused to try to mitigate the risks as best Anthropic can.
content:
As artificial intelligence's potential to reshape society grows, the CEO of Anthropic, a major AI company worth $183 billion, has centered his business's brand around safety and transparency.
